DKA.Title: Vajracchedikā; Ārya-Vajracchedikā-prajñāpāramitā-nāma-mahāyānasūtra; 'Phags pa śes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa źes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo; rDo rje gcod pa

div.h4:
Vajracchedikā
Ārya-Vajracchedikā-prajñāpāramitā-nāma-mahāyānasūtra
'Phags pa śes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa źes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
rDo rje gcod pa
div.p:
Beskrivelse
Text areas in red frames; red and silver circles indicating imaginary string holes. Diamond sutra dbu can script In gold and silver Described in detail in: Catalogue of Oriental Manuscripts in Danish Collections, vol. 6,1 [p. 10]
